attributes.action: take economic sanctions against any country where asylum seekers come from
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IN THIS DAY AND AGE THERE SHOULD NOT BE ANY ASYLUM SEEKERS.THOSE GOVERNMENTS THAT CREATE SITUATION WHICH ALLOW REFUGEES SHOULD BE SERIOUSLY ECONOMICALLY PUNISHED

rejection.details: Please resubmit without the excessive use of block capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
